text: inn janannalil ninnale tealpikkan arum tanneyilla. tirccayayum nan ninnalute sanraksakanayirikkum. enn parann keant pisac avarkk avarute ceytikal bhangiyayi teannicca sandarbhavum (orkkuka.) annane a rantusanghannal kantumuttiyappeal enikku ninnalumayi oru bandhavumilla, tirccayayum ninnal kanatta palatum nan kanunnuntâ€Œ, tirccayayum nan allahuve bhayappetunnu, allahu kathinamayi siksikkunnavanatre. enn parannukeant avan (pisacâ€Œ) pinmarikkalannu
